city.name: Guizhou
city.waterfallsDescr: One of the largest waterfalls in Asia, standing 77.8 meters tall and 101 meters wide. Surrounded by picturesque scenery and tropical forests.
city.jinjiangDescr: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, the mountain has stunning scenery and a sacred Buddhist site with several temples, attracting both nature enthusiasts and spiritual seekers.
city.minorityDescr: A significant Buddhist temple complex, famous for its 108-meter-tall Guanyin statue. Enjoy the peaceful atmosphere and beautiful gardens.
city.springsDescr: Guizhou is known for its hot springs, such as those in Anshun, where you can relax and enjoy spa treatments.
city.leipingDescr: A village known for its traditional architecture and minority culture. A great place to experience local customs and crafts.
city.parkDescr: A natural park with stunning views of mountains, forests, and rivers. A good spot for active recreation and enjoying nature.
